text: Hello HubSpot Developers, I have a potential bug to report in Widget Fields (in developer info) see the screenshots below the Module field name was changed from “background_video_url” to “url_field” and now both show  because it looks like both have default content saved even though the “background_video_url” field no longer exists. Strange and confusing.

Hello all, I have a custom made website navigation menu and I would like to add a light and dark theme so it could fit in different types of backgrounds. How can I add this option on the edit page level? Anyone with experience with this?
